item.title: Using NetTriage for IP & Domain Triage
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Automate IP and domain investigations with NetTriage, a Python tool that performs reputation lookups, DNS resolution, WHOIS checks, and passive DNS analysis for rapid threat triage.
